description: Gear up with Smartwool's Men's Merino Sport 150 Park Vibes Graphic Tee. The Sport fabric brings you all of the natural performance benefits of ZQ-certified Merino wool with the durability and quick dry time of Polyester. This top is designed for more comfort and less chafing when wearing a pack, so walk, hike, and adventure on with the unmatched feeling of their Merino wool apparel.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 - Park Vibes Graphic Tee - Mens
